ARABIC: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلْبَلَٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger. But if you turn your backs, the Messenger is only responsible for clear transmission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Obey God and obey His Apostle. If you turn away, the duty of the Apostle is to convey the message clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger. But if you turn away from obedience, (then know that) Our Messenger has no other duty than to clearly convey the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Obey God and the Messenger, but if you turn away, know that the only duty of Our Messenger is to clearly preach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And obey Allah and obey His Noble Messenger; then if you turn away, know that the duty upon Our Noble Messenger is only to plainly convey.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Obey Allah, and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away, then the duty of Our Messenger is only to convey clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And obey Allah and obey the Apostle, but if you turn back, then upon Our Apostle devolves only the clear delivery (of the message).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And obey God, and obey the Messenger; but if you turn your backs, it is only for the Messenger to deliver the Manifest Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Obey Allah and obey His messenger; but if ye turn away, then the duty of Our messenger is only to convey (the message) plainly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: obey God and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away, remember that Our Messenger is only responsible for clearly conveying the message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Obey Allah and obey the apostlle; then if ye turn away, on Our apostle is only the preaching manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Obey Allah and obey the Apostle; but if you turn away, then Our Apostle’s duty is only to communicate in clear terms.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So obey Allah, and obey His Messenger: but if ye turn back, the duty of Our Messenger is but to proclaim (the Message) clearly and openly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Obey Allah, and obey the Messenger (Muhammad SAW), but if you turn away, then the duty of Our Messenger is only to convey (the Message) clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger. But, if you turn away, Our Messenger's duty is only to deliver the Clear Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So obey God, and obey the Messenger. But if you turn away—it is only incumbent on Our Messenger to deliver the clear message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [64:12] And obey God and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away, then the Messenger’s duty is only to communicate [the Message] clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Obey Allah) with regard to His obligations (and obey His messenger) with regard to his practices; it is also said this means: obey Allah regarding Allah's divine Oneness and obey His Messenger by accepting his message; (but if ye turn away) from their obedience, (then the duty of Our messenger) Muhammad (pbuh) (is only to convey (the message)) on behalf of Allah (plainly) i.e. in a language that you understand.
